medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute hepatitis associated with lamotrigine treatment
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced acute liver failure upon admission, with elevated liver enzymes. He had been on lamotrigine for 2 months prior to admission. No acute findings were present at the physical examination. His liver function tests were normal 2 months before.
medical_history.social_history: Denied use of over-the-counter medications, alcohol, or substance use; ingested a wild mushroom 1 month prior without acute effects.
